questions_1.question: How are LVDT and PLA related?
Options: The LVDT input is to provide the N1 control amplifier with an electrical signal that is an indication of the actual value of PLA.
The LVDT input is to provide the N2 control amplifier with a mechanical signal that is the actual value of PLA.
The LVDT output is to provide the N1 control amplifier with an electrical signal that is an indication of the approximate value of PLA.
The LVDT input is to deviate the N1 control amplifier with an electrical signal that is an indication of PLA.
